overview:
Mark Boardman is a showbiz reporter who started of in entertainment as a writer, freelance celebrity photographer and newspaper movie critic.

Since he launched his website http://www.markmeets.com he has made numerous TV apperances including slots on ITV1 show ‘This Morning, BBC’s ‘The One Show’ and landed his own chat show on T4.

In 2006 Mark was the Red Carpet Reporter for the BBC at the Baftas and started offering his expert views and first-hand insight into celebrity on Radio (After years of meeting celebs at award shows, premieres, TV studios and arranging interviews).

As a roving reporter for Channel for in 2007, Mark presented his weekly TV show ‘Homemade’ interviewing Hollywood stars from Will Smith, Leonardo DiCaprio, Jude Law, Cameron Diaz and Kate Windlet to name but a few. Mark currently runs of the the largest entertainment brands in the UK.

Having met over 4500 stars and with a reputation for getting inside scoops, Mark Boardman is a trained Journalists with a love of ‘celebrity’ and was featured on CNN recently and filmed for the Lily Allen documentary in 2010.

When Mark is not gracing the red carpets or capturing the inside-scoop on celebrity parties, he is a tireless charity fundraiser and regularly runs promotions, hosts events and raises money for good causes. Mark is also proud father to two wonderful children and married in early 2011.
